modName: ShadowWhispers Guide To Beautiful Skyrim Merged BSAs
summary: A tutorial on how to use many of the tools available on the Nexus to tidy up your Skyrim directory by not only merging mods, but BSA and loose files as well.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/qqBtnl1.png[/img][/center]
A tutorial on how to use many of the tools available on the Nexus to tidy up your Skyrim directory by not only merging mods, but BSA and loose files as well.

To say much more would be pretty much pasting the contents of the file in here. :D

The file is in Word's .DOCX format at the moment. Will work on a prettier .PDF at a later date and time.

I do NOT give permission to host this file anywhere else but right here on the good ol' Nexus, but I do grant permission to my multi-lingual friends to translate it into their languages, provided that they give me a link to the translated file (so I can link to it from here) as well as provide credit and linking back to this page.
author: ShadowWhisper

files.name: ShadowWhispers_Guide_V2
files.changelogHtml:
Added new info about MO's BSA handling
Added new info on important step needed in the pre-bundling file prep process.
